text: Hello, my name is Kyle Blackmon. I will be graduating from the University of Florida in 2024. Now, I am exploring my creative side with passion projects such as the ones you'll find posted here. I hope to keep this website updated with all of my future projects and career milestones!

hobbies.name: Weightlifting
hobbies.blurb: What started out as a way to clear my mind after a rough patch, turned into a true passion. Checkout the Swole Gator app!

hobbies.name: Crossword Puzzles
hobbies.blurb: I used to do the NYT every weekend with my grandma. Created an IOS Shortcut to expedite googling the answers!

hobbies.name: Catan
hobbies.blurb: Recently picked up this board game and I fell in love! Amazing combination of strategy and luck that I could play for hours!

hobbies.name: Baseball
hobbies.blurb: I grew up playing baseball and have always loved the Underdog mentality of the Baltimore Orioles. The team is exciting this year. #Birdland
